de.ostfalia.snakecore.controller.login

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ostfalia.snakecore.controller.BaseController
      • de.ostfalia.snakecore.controller.login.LoginController

  • public class LoginController
extends BaseController
    Author:
    Benjamin Wulfert The LoginController is responsible the login- or registration-process. The LoginController is the first user interface which the user has access to in the application.
